also recommend the crochet crowd how to change colors at https //www youtube com/watch v=dlfzytjm71o how to read the chart begin at the lower left corner at row 1 the x symbol is a chain stitch follow the chart by reading it from left to right a row of chain stitches then turn the piece and crochet back following the chart from right to left a row of single_crochet stitches shown as a box each box is one stitch o x the gray box is a skipped stitch this means after your chain stitch o o x you will place your first single_crochet in the third chain x x x x x x 4 o at the end of row 1 after your final single_crochet stitch you will chain x 3 one shown by the x and then turn your piece and begin row 2 the 2 o o o box with an o is one popcorn you will skip the first single x 1 crochet and place your popcorn in the 2nd single_crochet then x x x x x x x single_crochet in next stitch and then popcorn et al that s all there is to it back and forth until you re done if you are left-handed the only modification needed is when you join your popcorn instead of it popping out the back of the piece you will join the stitches so the popcorn faces you border with popcorn side facing you single_crochet in each stitch along the outside border place 3 single crochet stitches in each corner stitch continue all the way around until you reach your beginning stitch turn and single_crochet back around until you reach your beginning stitch join with a slip stitch visit color & shape design on etsy at https //www etsy com/shop/colorandshapedesign ref=si_shop jody pyott design s on ravelry
